name: Fountain
headline: High volume hiring made simple
description: Fountain’s all-in-one high volume hiring platform empowers the world’s leading enterprises to find the right people through smart, fast, and seamless recruiting. Candidates can apply anytime, anywhere in minutes, right from their phone. Automated and customizable processes streamline the candidate experience and save time for recruitment teams so they can scale with growing hiring needs. Advanced analytics provide end-to-end process visibility so managers can make swift, data-driven decisions. Throughout the candidate journey, the openly integrated platform enables companies to find, qualify and convert more applicants. Fountain’s global customers hire over 1.2 million workers annually in 78 countries.

# Elevate frontline work. _Increase_ _efficiency_.
Our software optimizes your workforce’s experience, from hiring and onboarding through growth and retention.
[Get Started](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/signup>)
![Home primary](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/illu-5.svg)![](http://fountain.com)
![](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/lower-left.svg)
We've opened opportunities for over 100+ million people
![Clear](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/img_clear_logo_home.svg)
![Bojangles](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/img_bojangles_logo_home.svg)
![Gopuff](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/img_gopuff_logo_home.svg)
![Sweetgreen](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/img_sweetgreen_logo_home.svg)
![Marsden](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/img_marsden_logo_home.svg)
![Stitchfix](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/img_stitchfix_logo_home.svg)
## Frontline workforce management that hits the suite spot 
You don’t have to switch solutions to benefit from our user-friendly software suite. Bring your current tools with you, and we’ll connect your data via API—it’s our behind-the-scenes magic.
[Get a Demo](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/signup>)
![hire](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/manage_illu@2x.png)
![Hire icons](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/hire-icons.png)
##### 1
### Hire
Hire faster, smarter, and more efficiently.
![Manage products](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/hire_products_illu@2x.png)
![Manage Icons](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/manage-icons.png)
##### 2
### Manage
Tame administrative complexity for workers and supervisors alike.
![Retain](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/retain_illu@2x.png)
![Retain icons](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/retain-icons.png)
##### 3
### Retain
Reduce friction, increase engagement, create opportunities.
![img_hire_new](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/img_hire_new.png)
## Hire at the speed of work
Most applicant tracking systems aren’t built to handle the sheer volume and intense surges of frontline work. Ours was designed from the ground up to help your team ace frontline hiring:
  * Post to social media and hundreds of job boards with one click.
  * Text-to-apply functionality via SMS
  * Automate candidate assessments and credential verification.


[Learn More](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/hire>)
## Frontline hiring help wherever you need it 
Even the best HR teams need support. Make acquisition easier than ever with our two complementary frontline hiring products.
![Fountain Assist](http://fountain.com) [Learn More](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/assist>)
### Fountain Assist
Speed up your hiring process with our expert frontline recruiting services, powered by our advanced AI-enabled tools within the Fountain workforce management platform.
![Fountain Reach](http://fountain.com) [Learn More](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/reach>)
### Fountain Reach
Our highly targeted, AI-driven tool surfaces hidden talent by moving beyond traditional job boards. We help your hiring team find the right workers—fast.
## Your partner in frontline hiring
Your needs guide us, and our experience guides you. We collaborate with customers to develop new products and features, launched quarterly. Want in? Join our community of beta testers!
[Join Now](http://fountain.com/<https:/docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeymBLfOfU0LYFi0cjUHyXwntWzPKhcF0rtE6hnPMEuUX0-zQ/viewform>)
![Partner Features](http://fountain.com)
### Tailored features
Our design, product, and engineering teams customize functions to your input.
![Early Access](http://fountain.com)
### Early access
Get advanced access to our latest features and products.
![Partner Beta](http://fountain.com)
### Free beta use
Enjoy new products completely free while they’re in the beta stage.
![Partner Pricing](http://fountain.com)
### Discounted pricing
Access preferential pricing once products exit beta.
## Elevate the everyday in workforce management 
The way your people experience work impacts your bottom line. Keep them engaged with seamless onboarding and I-9, clear compliance, and personalized communications.
[ ![Fountain Onboard](http://fountain.com) ![Fountain Onboard](http://fountain.com) Fountain Onboard The fastest path from “offer sent” to day one, Fountain Onboard boosts employee retention before they even start their first shift. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/onboard>)
[ ![i9 Center](http://fountain.com) ![i9 Center](http://fountain.com) Fountain I-9 Center Our precise methods streamline I-9 verification and offer real-time insights into each worker’s status. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/i-9-center>)
[ ![Fountain Compliance](http://fountain.com) ![Fountain Compliance](http://fountain.com) Fountain Compliance Achieve 100% compliance through our effortless automation and attentive AI that keep your workforce fully productive at all times. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/compliance>)
[ ![Fountain Communicate](http://fountain.com) ![Fountain Communicate](http://fountain.com) Fountain Communicate Deliver targeted campaigns to dynamically engage with past, present, and future workers. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/communicate>)

Nick Prijic
Director of Driver Operations, Fetch
93%
decrease in average time-to-hire (15 days to one day)
“We saw _50% of acquired candidates get hired through re-routed applications_ that were idling and would have been lost.”
Large grocery chain
50%
More efficient acquisition spend 
“Automation helps us _reduce time-to-fill and drop-off rates_ , so we have less pressure from competitors.”
Rachel Carey
Recruiting Coordinator Lead, Stitch Fix
3X
more applicants attended interviews 
## Fountain AI prioritizes help over hype 
Our AI helps you get things done, but you always stay in control.

[ ![Fountain Compliance](http://fountain.com) ![Fountain Compliance](http://fountain.com) Fountain Compliance Automate document (re)collection and validation with AI that recognizes most document types. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/compliance>)

# Elevate frontline work. _Increase_ _efficiency_.
Our software optimizes your workforce’s experience, from hiring and onboarding through growth and retention.
Get Started⟨58⟩
![Home primary⟨59⟩]![](http://fountain.com)
![](https://www.fountain.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/lower-left.svg)
We've opened opportunities for over 100+ million people

## Frontline workforce management that hits the suite spot 
You don’t have to switch solutions to benefit from our user-friendly software suite. Bring your current tools with you, and we’ll connect your data via API—it’s our behind-the-scenes magic.
Get a Demo⟨58⟩
![hire⟨66⟩]
![Hire icons⟨67⟩]
##### 1
### Hire
Hire faster, smarter, and more efficiently.
![Manage products⟨68⟩]
![Manage Icons⟨69⟩]
##### 2
### Manage
Tame administrative complexity for workers and supervisors alike.
![Retain⟨70⟩]
![Retain icons⟨71⟩]
##### 3
### Retain
Reduce friction, increase engagement, create opportunities.
![img_hire_new⟨72⟩]
## Hire at the speed of work
Most applicant tracking systems aren’t built to handle the sheer volume and intense surges of frontline work. Ours was designed from the ground up to help your team ace frontline hiring:
  * Post to social media and hundreds of job boards with one click.
  * Text-to-apply functionality via SMS
  * Automate candidate assessments and credential verification.


Learn More⟨73⟩
## Frontline hiring help wherever you need it 
Even the best HR teams need support. Make acquisition easier than ever with our two complementary frontline hiring products.
![Fountain Assist⟨2⟩] Learn More⟨74⟩
### Fountain Assist
Speed up your hiring process with our expert frontline recruiting services, powered by our advanced AI-enabled tools within the Fountain workforce management platform.
![Fountain Reach⟨2⟩] Learn More⟨75⟩
### Fountain Reach
Our highly targeted, AI-driven tool surfaces hidden talent by moving beyond traditional job boards. We help your hiring team find the right workers—fast.
## Your partner in frontline hiring
Your needs guide us, and our experience guides you. We collaborate with customers to develop new products and features, launched quarterly. Want in? Join our community of beta testers!
Join Now⟨76⟩
![Partner Features⟨2⟩]
### Tailored features
Our design, product, and engineering teams customize functions to your input.
![Early Access⟨2⟩]
### Early access
Get advanced access to our latest features and products.
![Partner Beta⟨2⟩]
### Free beta use
Enjoy new products completely free while they’re in the beta stage.
![Partner Pricing⟨2⟩]
### Discounted pricing
Access preferential pricing once products exit beta.
## Elevate the everyday in workforce management 
The way your people experience work impacts your bottom line. Keep them engaged with seamless onboarding and I-9, clear compliance, and personalized communications.
 ![Fountain Onboard⟨2⟩ ![Fountain Onboard⟨2⟩] Fountain Onboard The fastest path from “offer sent” to day one, Fountain Onboard boosts employee retention before they even start their first shift. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/onboard>)

 ![Fountain Compliance⟨2⟩ ![Fountain Compliance⟨2⟩] Fountain Compliance Achieve 100% compliance through our effortless automation and attentive AI that keep your workforce fully productive at all times. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/compliance>)
 ![Fountain Communicate⟨2⟩ ![Fountain Communicate⟨2⟩] Fountain Communicate Deliver targeted campaigns to dynamically engage with past, present, and future workers. ](http://fountain.com/<https:/www.fountain.com/communicate>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Fountain**

Founded in 2015 and based in San Francisco, Fountain operates as an all-in-one high-volume hiring platform designed to simplify and enhance recruitment for enterprises globally. It emerged from Y Combinator's 2015 Summer Batch (Batch S15). Today, Fountain boasts a dynamic team of around 200 employees and has established itself as a key player in the HR-tech landscape.

**Mission and Offering:**
Fountain’s core mission is straightforward yet powerful: "High-volume hiring made simple." The platform empowers organizations to find the right talent efficiently, allowing candidates to apply quickly from anywhere on their mobile phones. Fountain facilitates a seamless candidate experience through automated and customizable processes, enabling recruitment teams to scale effectively as hiring demands grow. 

Its features are geared towards providing comprehensive analytics and insights, allowing managers to make swift, data-driven hiring decisions. Fountain serves over 1.2 million hires annually across 78 countries, showcasing its global reach and versatility.

**Key Features and Tools:**
Fountain's platform integrates various tools that address different stages of the hiring process:

1. **Hiring:**
   - **Assist**: Simplified sourcing for candidates.
   - **Reach**: AI-driven targeting to uncover hidden talent.
   - **Hire**: Streamlined hiring processes.
   - **Hire Go**: Mobile-first application features.
   - **AI Recruiter**: Automates candidate screening.
   - **Insights**: Leverages data for more informed hiring decisions.

2. **Managing:**
   - **Onboard**: Efficient onboarding processes to engage new hires.
   - **I-9 Center**: Ensures compliance with I-9 documentation.
   - **Compliance**: Simplifies HR compliance tasks.
   - **Shift**: Transforms workforce scheduling.

3. **Retaining:**
   - **Communicate**: AI-powered messaging for better candidate engagement.
   - **Pulse**: Gauge sentiment through AI-driven analytics.
   - **Referrals**: Enhance employee referral programs.

**Marketplace Positioning:**
Fountain is strategically tagged in categories such as AIOps, Marketplace, SaaS, HR-Tech, and primarily operates within the San Francisco Bay Area. This positioning underscores its commitment to leveraging technology to meet modern hiring challenges.

**Insights and Community:**
Fountain maintains a vibrant community-focused presence, often collaborating with customers to evolve its features quarterly. It welcomes users to join as beta testers for upcoming products, placing customer insights at the forefront of its development strategy.

**Why Choose Fountain?**
For enterprises navigating the complexities of high-volume hiring, Fountain positions itself not just as an applicant tracking system but as a comprehensive workforce management platform. Its emphasis on automation paired with a human touch is illustrated in its case studies, such as significant time savings for clients like Bojangles—a decrease of 80% in time-to-hire, showcasing tangible benefits.

In a world where the hiring landscape is always changing, Fountain stands out by making the process smarter, faster, and simpler, all while keeping the human aspect central to its mission.

For more information, visit [Fountain's website](http://fountain.com).
